Method Detail

getVisibleLayer

Layer getVisibleLayer()
Returns:
this RBM's visible layer.

getHiddenLayer

Layer getHiddenLayer()
Returns:
this RBM's hidden layer.

setVisibleLayerType

void setVisibleLayerType(Layer someLayer)
This function should set this rbm's visible layer to the type of 'someLayer'. The RBM's current visible layer's learning rates, biases, etc, will remain unchanged.

Parameters:
someLayer - The layer whose type will replace that of this RBM's visible layer.

setHiddenLayerType

void setHiddenLayerType(Layer someLayer)
This function should set this rbm's hidden layer to the type of 'someLayer'. The RBM's current hidden layer's learning rates, biases, etc, will remain unchanged.

Parameters:
someLayer - The layer whose type will replace that of this RBM's hidden layer.

changeNumVisibleUnits

void changeNumVisibleUnits(int numOfUnits)
This function changes the biases and bias increments of the visible layer. This function also alters the weight matrix, and does its best to preserve any weights that aren't affected by the change.

Parameters:
numOfUnits - The new number of visible units. Must be an integer > 0.

changeNumHiddenUnits

void changeNumHiddenUnits(int numOfUnits)
This function changes the biases and bias increments of the hidden layer. This function also alters the weight matrix, and does its best to preserve any weights that aren't affected by the change.

Parameters:
numOfUnits - The new number of visible units. Must be an integer > 0.

getConnectionWeightVector

double[] getConnectionWeightVector()
This RBM's weight matrix in vector form. Manipulations done to this array will not affect the weight matrix of this RBM.

Returns:
This RBM's weight matrix in vector form.

setConnectionWeightVector

void setConnectionWeightVector(double[] weightConnectionVector)
Sets this RBM's weight matrix to the given weight matrix in array form.

Parameters:
weightConnectionVector - The new weight matrix in array form.

getConnectionWeightIncrementVector

double[] getConnectionWeightIncrementVector()

setConnectionWeightIncrementVector

void setConnectionWeightIncrementVector(double[] connectionWeightIncrementVector)

getConnectionWeightVectorLength

int getConnectionWeightVectorLength()
Returns:
The length of this RBM's vectorized weight matrix.

getConnectionWeights

double[][] getConnectionWeights()
Returns a reference to this RBM's weight matrix. Manipulations done to this matrix *will* affect this RBM's weights. The array will be sized double[numVisibleUnits][numHiddenUnits].

Returns:
this RBM's connection weight matrix.

setConnectionWeights

void setConnectionWeights(double[][] weightConnections)
Sets this RBM's connection weight matrix to the one specified. The new weight matrix should have the correct dimensions: double[numVisibleUnits][numHiddenUnits]. Otherwise, RBM functionality cannot be guaranteed.

Parameters:
weightConnections - this RBM's new connection weight matrix.

getConnectionWeightIncrement

double[][] getConnectionWeightIncrement()

setConnectionWeightIncrement

void setConnectionWeightIncrement(double[][] connectionWeightIncrementVector)

getLearningRate

double getLearningRate()
Returns this RBM's learning rate.

Returns:
this RBM's learning rate.

setLearningRate

void setLearningRate(double newLearningRate)
Sets this RBM's learning rate to the specified learning rate.

Parameters:
newLearningRate - a number > 0 but usually no larger than 0.1

getMomentum

double getMomentum()
Returns this RBM's momentum value.

Returns:
this RBM's momentum value.

setMomentum

void setMomentum(double newMomentum)
Sets this RBM's momentum value to the specified value.

Parameters:
newMomentum - a number > 0, but usually no larger than 0.9

getWeightCost

double getWeightCost()
Returns this RBM's weight cost value.

Returns:
this RBM's weight cost value.

setWeightCost

void setWeightCost(double newWeightCost)
Sets this RBM's weight cost value to the specified value.

Parameters:
newWeightCost - a very small positive number. Usually no larger than 0.001 * learningRate.

getUpwardSWSum

double[][] getUpwardSWSum(double[][] batchVisibleData)
Returns a batch of summed state-weight products of the visible units and the the RBM's weights.

Parameters:
batchVisibleData - Should be of dimension double[n][numVisibleUnits] where 'n' is any number.
Returns:
a batch of state-weight summations ready to be fed into the hidden layer to be passed through its hidden unit activation function. Returned matrix should be of dimension double[n][numHiddenUnits] where 'n' is the same n in batchVisibleData[n][numVisibleUnits].

getDownwardSWSum

double[][] getDownwardSWSum(double[][] batchHiddenData)
Returns a batch of summed state-weight products of the hidden units and the the RBM's weights.

Parameters:
batchHiddenData - Should be of dimension double[n][numHiddenUnits] where 'n' is any number.
Returns:
a batch of state-weight summations ready to be fed into the visible layer to be passed through its visible unit activation function. Returned matrix should be of dimension double[n][numVisibleUnits] where 'n' is the same n in batchHiddenData[n][numHiddenUnits].

getHiddenActivitiesFromVisibleData

double[][] getHiddenActivitiesFromVisibleData(double[][] batchVisibledata)
Returns hidden-layer activations for a group of data vectors.

Parameters:
batchVisibledata - group of data vectors. Should be of dimension double[n][numVisibleUnits] where n > 0
Returns:
a group of hidden activations of dimension double[batchVisibledata.length][numHiddenUnits].

getHiddenActivitiesFromVisibleData

double[] getHiddenActivitiesFromVisibleData(double[] visibleData)
Returns hidden-layer activations for a single data vector.

Parameters:
visibleData - a data vector. Should be of dimension double[numVisibleUnits]
Returns:
a single hidden activation of dimension double[numHiddenUnits]

GenerateHiddenUnits

double[][] GenerateHiddenUnits(double[][] batchHiddenActivities)
Activates the hidden activities according to this RBM's hidden layer. For example, a StochasticBinaryLayer will convert the hidden activities to binary activations. If no such process exists for the hidden layer, the function should simply return the hidden activities unmodified.

Parameters:
batchHiddenActivities - A group of data vectors. Should be of dimension double[n][numHiddenUnits] where n > 0
Returns:
A group of hidden activations of dimension double[batchHiddenActivties.length][numHiddenUnits]

GenerateHiddenUnits

double[] GenerateHiddenUnits(double[] hiddenActivities)
Activates the hidden activities according to this RBM's hidden layer. If this process is unspecified in this RBM's hidden layer, then the function should return the hidden activities unmodified.

Parameters:
hiddenActivities - A single hidden activities vector of dimension double[numHiddenUnits]
Returns:
a single activations vector of dimension double[numHiddenUnits]

getVisibleActivitiesFromHiddenData

double[][] getVisibleActivitiesFromHiddenData(double[][] batchHiddenData)
Returns visible-layer activations for a group of data vectors.

Parameters:
batchHiddenData - group of data vectors. Should be of dimension double[n][numHiddenUnits] where n > 0
Returns:
a group of visible activations of dimension double[batchHiddenData.length][numVisibleUnits].

getVisibleActivitiesFromHiddenData

double[] getVisibleActivitiesFromHiddenData(double[] hiddenData)
Returns visible-layer activations for a single data vector.

Parameters:
visibleData - a data vector. Should be of dimension double[numHiddenUnits]
Returns:
a single hidden activation of dimension double[numVisibleUnits]

GenerateVisibleUnits

double[][] GenerateVisibleUnits(double[][] batchVisibleActivities)
Activates the visible activities according to this RBM's visible layer. If no such process exists for the visible layer, the function should simply return the visible activities unmodified.

Parameters:
batchVisibleActivities - A group of data vectors. Should be of dimension double[n][numVisibleUnits] where n > 0
Returns:
A group of visible activations of dimension double[batchVisibleActivities.length][numVisibleUnits]

GenerateVisibleUnits

double[] GenerateVisibleUnits(double[] visibleActivities)
Activates the visible activities according to this RBM's visible layer. If this process is unspecified in this RBM's visible layer, then the function should return the visible activities unmodified.

Parameters:
hiddenActivities - A single visible activities vector of dimension double[numVisibleUnits]
Returns:
a single activations vector of dimension double[numVisibleUnits]

UpdateHiddenBiases

void UpdateHiddenBiases(double[][] hiddenActivities,
                        double[][] negativePhaseHiddenActivities)
Updates the RBM's hidden biases.

hiddenActivities.length should equal negativePhaseHiddenActivities.length

Parameters:
hiddenActivities - the hidden activities from the positive phase of contrastive divergence learning.
negativePhaseHiddenActivities - the hidden activities from the negative phase of constrastive divergence learning.

UpdateVisibleBiases

void UpdateVisibleBiases(double[][] data,
                         double[][] negativePhaseVisibleActivities)
Updates the RBM's visible biases.

data.length should equal negativePhaseVisibleActivities.length

Parameters:
data - the data vectors from the positive phase of contrastive divergence learning.
negativePhaseVisibleActivities - the visible activities from the negative phase of constrastive divergence learning.

getVisibleHiddenStateProductsVector

double[] getVisibleHiddenStateProductsVector(double[][] visibleActivities,
                                             double[][] hiddenActivities)

getVisibleHiddenStateProducts

double[][] getVisibleHiddenStateProducts(double[][] visibleActivities,
                                         double[][] hiddenActivities)

getNumHiddenUnits

int getNumHiddenUnits()
Returns the number of units in this RBM's hidden layer.

Returns:
the number of hidden units.

getNumVisibleUnits

int getNumVisibleUnits()
Returns the number of units in this RBM's visible layer.

Returns:
the number of visible units.

getFlipped

RBM getFlipped()
Returns an inverted (up-side down) version of this RBM. All connection weights, biases, layers and layer types are unchanged.

Returns:
a reference to an inverted version of this RBM

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string description of this RBM, including all connection weights, so be careful when using with large RBMs!

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string description of this RBM

clone

RBM clone()
Returns an exact copy of this RBM.

Returns:
a reference to an identical RBM as this

getConnectionWeightDerivativesVector

double[] getConnectionWeightDerivativesVector(double[] visibleActivities,
                                              double[] hiddenActivities,
                                              double[] hiddenLayerError)
Returns the weight derivatives calculated from a backpropagated error in the hidden layer

Parameters:
visibleActivities - Activations in the visible layer
hiddenActivities - Activations in the hidden layer
hiddenLayerError - Error in the hidden layer
Returns:
Vectorized Weight derivatives for the visible-hidden connections

getConnectionWeightDerivativesVector

                                              double[][] hiddenActivities,
                                              double[][] hiddenLayerError)
Returns the weight derivatives calculated from a backpropagated error in the hidden layer

Parameters:
visibleActivities - Activations in the visible layer
hiddenActivities - Activations in the hidden layer
hiddenLayerError - Error in the hidden layer
Returns:
Vectorized Weight derivatives for the visible-hidden connections

getConnectionWeightDerivatives

double[][] getConnectionWeightDerivatives(double[] visibleActivities,
                                          double[] hiddenActivities,
                                          double[] hiddenLayerError)
Returns the weight derivatives calculated from a backpropagated error in the hidden layer

Parameters:
visibleActivities - Activations in the visible layer
hiddenActivities - Activations in the hidden layer
hiddenLayerError - Error in the hidden layer
Returns:
Weight derivatives for the visible-hidden connections

getConnectionWeightDerivatives

double[][] getConnectionWeightDerivatives(double[][] visibleActivities,
                                          double[][] hiddenActivities,
                                          double[][] hiddenLayerError)
Returns the weight derivatives calculated from a backpropagated error in the hidden layer

Parameters:
visibleActivities - Batch of Activations in the visible layer
hiddenActivities - Batch of Activations in the hidden layer
hiddenLayerError - Batch of Errors in the hidden layer
Returns:
Weight derivatives for the visible-hidden connections

getVisibleLayerError

double[][] getVisibleLayerError(double[][] hiddenLayerError)
Returns the error in the visible layer by backpropagating the errors in the hidden layer

Parameters:
hiddenLayerError - Error in the hidden layer
Returns:
Backpropagated error in the visible layer
